title: Citi's McQuade, Hart on Their First Visit to Ukraine
summary: Kiev, Ukraine – Gene McQuade, CEO Citibank N.A., and Hollis Hart, Head of International Franchise Management, visited Citi Ukraine in Kyiv on May 24-25 as part of their ongoing global franchise reviews. During their visit, Mr. McQuade and Mr. Hart received a full franchise briefing from Citi Ukraine's senior management team, conducted a town hall with all staff, hosted a Global Subsidiaries Group CEO cocktail event, were briefed by the U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine, John Tefft, and learned about and celebrated some Ukrainian traditions at a local restaurant with the senior management team.
tag-1: Citi's McQuade, Hart on Their First Visit to Ukraine
tag-3: Kiev, Ukraine – Gene McQuade, CEO Citibank N.A., and Hollis Hart, Head of International Franchise Management, visited Citi Ukraine in Kyiv on May 24-25 as part of their ongoing global franchise reviews. During their visit, Mr. McQuade and Mr. Hart received a full franchise briefing from Citi Ukraine's senior management team, conducted a town hall with all staff, hosted a Global Subsidiaries Group CEO cocktail event, were briefed by the U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine, John Tefft, and learned about and celebrated some Ukrainian traditions at a local restaurant with the senior management team.
tag-4: Steven Fisher, CCO Ukraine, remarked: "Citi Ukraine was very pleased to welcome Gene and Hollis to Kiev, particularly because it was their first time visiting the country. The entire team participated in the visit and did a thorough job briefing Gene and Hollis on our current activities and future plans in Ukraine."
tag-5: Citi Ukraine achieved record revenue and net profit results in 2010. The franchise recently won the annual "2010 Best Cash Management Bank in Ukraine" award from Euromoney Magazine, the "2010 Best Corporate Internet Bank in Ukraine Award" from Global Finance Magazine and again placed on top of the annual "Euromoney FX Spot Poll of Ukrainian Corporations."
tag-6: Citi Citi, a leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
tag-7: Citi Ukraine Citi established a Representative Office in Ukraine in 1997 and was incorporated as a wholly-owned subsidiary in 1998, making it the 100th country in Citi's global network. Citi Ukraine has 110 employees and provides a full range of services to corporate and commercial banking clients. Citi Ukraine has significantly expanded its customer base to over 400 customers, and leads important financing transactions for the Government of Ukraine, as well as key multinational companies and top tier Ukrainian companies.
